purpose: To provide a comprehensive collection of sample code and application examples that facilitate the understanding and implementation of AG2 (AutoGen) capabilities.
principle: To enhance developer productivity by offering practical demonstrations and templates that can be easily adapted for various applications using AG2.
reusability: The code samples and applications are designed to be modular and reusable, allowing developers to integrate them into their own projects with minimal modifications.
limitations: The repository is in alpha status, which may indicate incomplete features and potential issues. Users should expect limited documentation and support as it is still under active development.
name: build-with-ag2
description: Sample code and application showcases to get you going with AG2 (formally AutoGen)
highlight: Comprehensive examples showcasing the capabilities of AG2 for rapid prototyping and implementation.
